rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space that aligns with Vastu principles by facing the south for auspicious entry.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious room with high ceilings and large windows on the eastern side to maximize morning light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to living area for communal dining; designed with a modern Brutalist aesthetic.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Located in the south-west corner to promote relaxation and positive energy; incorporates natural light through skylights.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Adjacent to the master bedroom, ensuring privacy and natural ventilation; large windows on the north.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Optimized for ventilation and light by orienting towards the east; designed with open spaces.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen in the north-east quadrant to ensure proper ventilation and compliance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: Catering space for domestic help and storage; located near the kitchen with easy access.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Enhanced living space with a private balcony on the eastern side to capture natural light and offer a view.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional master bedroom designed with large windows for ample ventilation and light; located adjacent to a private bathroom.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Spacious room with an emphasis on natural light and airflow; positioned towards the north for balanced energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Compact bedroom designed with Vastu principles in mind by orienting windows to the south for positive energy.

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.description: Dedicated space for work and study; large eastern window ensures natural morning light and a calm atmosphere.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Brutalist design on the roof with exposed concrete structures and minimalistic decor; designed for relaxation and social gatherings.

vastu_considerations: Entrance facing south for positive energy.
Major rooms oriented to receive ample morning light on the eastern side.
Bedrooms designed with natural ventilation and balanced window placements.
